item.title: Why Migrate to Hugo
item.description: Finally, from CMS, I decided to use a framework that is said to be the fastest framework. And it really feels like this is the first time I’ve tasted the fun of writing on a blog using a static site, for this other time I decided on a static site generator with Hugo.
